title: I always have internet problem but only in league
body:
whenever i play other online games, i dont have ANY internet problems, only when i play league.
it often says "Attempting to reconnect" and i play half of the game with characters standing still but still moving, or dead characters moving around.
since im a draven main its pretty hard cuz i cant see where my axes drop or my ult is just fkd up.
often my ping doesnt even get high or change but still got the ping lag.
does anyone else has this problem?

replies.body: Your connection seems to be having problems communicating to the game server, and kicking you off.  Your internet might be fine, but you can still have issues or blocks reaching specific services.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to restore these comms and stay in-game.  Be sure to test it in a custom to prevent any penalties, though.

I have same issue frequently. No problem login to the game but lots of problems getting to game instance nodes. I have been reporting this to support since season 2. There has been no investigation.

Apparently EUNE and EUW support are totally incompetent in investigation and giving the problems to NA devs. I suggest you start firing people form EUNE support.
